scripts.configure: yarn playwright install && yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright install firefox && git update-index --skip-worktree e2e/config.ts
scripts.changeConfig: git update-index --no-skip-worktree e2e/config.ts && echo 'Commit the config changes and then rerun yarn configure'
scripts.test:manageCasesChrome: yarn playwright install && yarn playwright test --project chromium --grep @manageCases
scripts.test:manageCasesFirefox: yarn playwright install firefox && yarn playwright test --project firefox --grep @crossbrowserManageCases
scripts.test:manageCasesSafari: yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright test --project webkit --grep @crossbrowserManageCases
scripts.test:manageCasesAccessibility: yarn playwright install && yarn playwright test --project chromium --grep @accessibilityManageCases
scripts.test:citizenFrontendChrome: yarn playwright install && yarn playwright test --project chromium --grep @citizenFrontend
scripts.test:citizenFrontendFirefox: yarn playwright install firefox && yarn playwright test --project firefox --grep @crossbrowsercitizenFrontend
scripts.test:citizenFrontendSafari: yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright test --project webkit --grep @crossbrowsercitizenFrontend
scripts.test:citizenFrontendAccessibility: yarn playwright install && yarn playwright test --project chromium --grep @accessibilitycitizenFrontend
